short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expands the Asgard Legend Mob Database with a calculator for the drop rates of the Steal skill.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A calculator will be added below the monster natural drop rates.

You will be able to select your dex stat and steal skill level so the rates are calculated as accurately as possible.

Since you always get one item through the steal skill, the rates are raised to add up to 100% making these rates accurate for a player determinated to get an item.

This extension is not from the Asgard Legend server team but a fan made tool. If they decide to make changes on their website, this extension might break.
